h2_title: Black Wind King Boss Fight and Guide
content: The Black Wind King will start the fight with a jumping spear thrust, pausing in mid-air briefly before lunging forward, and powering his spear with the Black Wind to throw it into the ground in front of him as he lands.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Wind_King.md', within the main section titled 'Black Wind King', specifically from the subsection 'Black Wind King Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The Black Wind King will start the fight with a jumping spear thrust, pausing in mid-air briefly before lunging forward, and powering his spear with the Black Wind to throw it into the ground in front of him as he lands.
